page.title: 04RECREATION AND TOURISM
page.content: Many of the recreation facilities are designed to be used by holiday makers such as the newly built leisure centre,Beau Sejour.Sports are well catered for with a number of football pitches and running tracks in the centre of the Island.A new outdoor sports facility will be completed next year,the King George V playing fields. New leisure and sports facilities to appear recently in this area include Oatlands,a craft complex and a number of self catering units. Hotels continue to prosper and one of the Islands few large camping sites, the Capelles camp site,is situated here.Land area is limited and restrictions apply to land use for tourism e.g.caravans are not permitted.
